title: Life Extension's Faloon on Science Behind Age Reversal (Audio)
itunes:title: Life Extension's Faloon on Science Behind Age Reversal (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: HEALTHCARE: Bill Faloon, Co-Founder of the Life Extension Foundation, on the RAAD Fest, the world's largest gathering of life extension enthusiasts, and the science behind age reversal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
